product_name: The North Face Morningside Fleece Jacket - Girls'
long_description: Ideal for cold weather, The North Face Morningside fleece jacket offers girls backcountry-ready performance with smooth, heavyweight fleece and a soft, silky lining. Turned hem binding at hood, cuffs and hem adds detail. Fixed hood; on-seam hand pockets; ID label. The North Face Morningside fleece jacket has embroidered logos at the left chest and back right shoulder.
short_description: Ideal for cold weather, The North Face Morningside fleece jacket offers girls backcountry-ready performance with smooth, heavyweight fleece and a soft, silky lining.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
